content: this cute halloween cat doily features three mischievous kittens and a pumpkin filet works up quickly and is timelessly charming worked in a double_crochet mesh with size 10 thread this doily measures approximately 18 x 20 work a cute border and lay the doily flat or tie to a dowel and hang up for a festive tapestry happy crafting **update 10/13/23 ** pdf has been updated to include a second slightly narrower version of the design worked in a double_crochet mesh with size 10 thread this version measures ~15 x 20
